actions.name: Stomp
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 27 (5d8 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 32 (6d8 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage.
